physical_appearance:The image shows a rectangular photograph that is in black-and-white. A man and a woman are featured in the photograph. They are standing beside one another. The woman is dressed in her ethnic costume. Both of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. The woman is wearing a necklace and several bangles. Both of them have garlands slung over their left hands. The background of the photograph suggests that this was taken in the interior of a building.
